longDescription.en: If a texture contains empty alpha channel, 'Alpha Source' flag should be turned off otherwise it will waste memory.
longDescription.zh: 如果纹理包含空的alpha通道，则应禁用'Alpha源'标志，否则会浪费这部分的内存。

hint.en: Check the option under: Inspector -> Alpha Source
hint.zh: 检查Inspector -> Alpha Source选项

description.en: Alpha Source flag for textures with empty Alpha channel should be turned off
description.zh: 应禁用具有空Alpha通道的纹理的‘Alpha源’标志

description.en: Pure color texture may waste memory
description.zh: 纯色纹理会浪费内存

longDescription.en: The usage of pure color texture may could be replaced with configurations, please check. This issue will be only reported when the pure color texture is larger than 16 * 16 in case there is no replacement.
longDescription.zh: 纯色纹理的使用可能可以由一些设置来代替。由于某些情况下纯色纹理是必不可少的，此警告仅会在所使用的纹理较大(>16*16)时才会触发。

description.en: Pure color texture may waste memory

longDescription.en: Texture with large transparent edge should be cropped to save memory

nameDescription.zh: 检查雪碧图纹理填充率

longDescription.en: Low fill rate of sprite map will cause waste of GPU memory
longDescription.zh: 填充率是雪碧图分割后的有效面积与总面积的比率，较低的雪碧图纹理填充率会导致显存的浪费。

hint.en: Try reordering the structure of sprite map to vanish blank part and increase fill part.
hint.zh: 尝试重新编排雪碧图，尽量缩小总面积以提高填充率
